title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.4 - Compliance with directions of authority employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.4 - Compliance with directions of authority employees

State Regulations

No person shall fail or refuse to comply with any lawful
order or direction of any authority employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
